name: VR Chase Little Flappy Underwater Mermaid
name_original: VR Chase Little Flappy Underwater Mermaid
description:
Have you ever thought of being a mermaid so you can explore the inner beauty of the fantastic world under water, dance with a dazzling array of aquatic creatures? A journey filled with magic, myth, romance, and adventure when little sea beauty meets human prince.
How to play
Open game to dip into the wonderful sea world. Now, you're the gorgeous mermaid. Let's take a good look at this wonderful place. You can relax and rejuvenate yourself with top notch sea spa. Let the deep ocean water run over your face

Key Feature;
- Enjoy a fun and playful adventure in fantasy. - Beautiful sea environment. - Let the gorgeous visuals indulge you in amazing sea world. - Share wonderful moments with charming princes. - Tons of fancy items will definitely blow your mind.
